overview: Sarah Austin is a Bay Area based video journalist who went by the name Sarah Meyers prior to June 2008. She offers opinions, interviews and tech news on her Internet show, Pop17, which focuses on “the new cultural phenomenon of online culture” She also writes for Forbes and hosts on the Forbes.con video network. She is profiled in photo spreads in print magazines such as Vanity Fair and Fast Company in 2010. She graced the cover of Personal Branding Magazine in 2009. She is the founder and CEO of news network, Pop17.com.
